Title: Downshift
Plot: Gibbs reluctantly falls into puppy love. Milo gets caught up in a relationship that is moving too fast for everyone to handle. And Neal teaches Tyler a lesson about the perfect hamburger.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Meredith Hagner, Peri Gilpin, Sarah Wright, Kamala Jones, Jerry Lacy
